column3: str
Slowly but surely, Alphinaud is regaining his composure.
Speak with Alisaie.
Search for wounded soldiers in need of assistance.
Speak with Alphinaud.
I promise...
No, no, no! You can't! Not now... <sniffle> <sob>
...Forgive me. Now is not the time for vows of vengeance. We must remain calm and rational and in control.
The imperials have demonstrated a willingness to fire on their own. So long as we remain here, we are in danger.
We three will see to Commander Kemp's body. Find my sister and return to Ala Ghiri.
We'll look after him. You should go.
<sniffle> <sob>
We will meet you in Ala Ghiri. I pray you find my sister and leave at once.
There, that should suffice for now. Go on and join the others.
...Tell me you've found Alphinaud. Tell me he is all right.
Oh, thank the Twelve! I don't know what I would have done... Though, saying that, what will the Resistance do without Commander Kemp?
Sorry─not here, not now. We should return to Ala Ghiri. Keep an eye out for any wounded who need our help on the way.
Oh, oh, bless you, kind─ Wait, is that you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
I didn't recognize you at first. Been feeling a bit dizzy. Must've lost a lot of blood. I...I can keep going. I can keep going...
Go on without me, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I'll not be long.
...Thanks, friend. Bloody tourniquet came loose and I was having trouble getting it back on. I should be fine the rest of the way.
I can manage on my own. Reckon you've got more important things to do than watch over a poor sod like me.
<pant> <pant> ...It wasn't long ago I was trying to kill you and yours. I half expected you were about to slit my throat.
To hells with this. I should be back home in Ilsabard, instead of taking fire from my so-called comrades.
Put me in a gaol or wherever─I'm through with it. Do you hear me? I surrender!
What should we do? We've got plenty of our own wounded to deal with. Say the word and I'll finish him quick!
It's up to all of us to carry on in his stead. It's up to me...
I knew we'd lose people doing this, but <Emphasis>him</Emphasis>...? I was sure the old bear would outlast us all.
I did what I could for those I found along the way...but some were beyond help.
...No need to say it. I heard.
We lost a lot of men inside the tower. Casualties are still mounting among those who survived.
The Elder Seedseer has been informed. By the grace of the Matron, mayhap we can yet save more lives...
Whatever “rules of war” can be said to exist, that whoreson has broken them all. This will not stand!
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. We have given over Commander Kemp's remains for safekeeping. Later─I have no idea when─rites must needs be performed...
For now, however, we must carry on. We must press forward. We must not give in to despair...
